about_the_game:
Encephalon Gorgers on the Moon


The Forest of Night has always been a strange place. The trees are far too tall and far too thick here. Even the bravest of hunters shy away the forest's higher paths. Now, the folk who live upon the slopes of the mountain have complained of strange occurrences, especially around the time of the full moon. Weird shrieks have been heard in the trees. Some suspect an ancient curse centered on the mysterious ruins on Midnight Mountain. Who will investigate on behalf of the terrified locals?

What to Expect

Encephalon Gorgers on the Moon by Casey Christofferson- presented in Fifth Edition - is an adventure for mid-level characters (tier 2 about levels 7 to 8).

Within its covers you will find:

  • A stand-alone adventure completed in 2-3 gaming sessions
  • A horror mystery from beyond space and time
  • Exploration of new worlds and dimensions
  • Full Color Maps by Robert Altbaur
  • Richly Illustrated by Michael Syrigos
  • Cats!

Fantasy Grounds conversion includes a reference manual, tokens for many of the new monsters, and fully populated and placed (where appropriate) encounters.

Converted by: Michael Potter

Released on October 07, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
